summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2013/12/07 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ken Annakin'], 'Producers': ['Milton Sperling', 'Philip Yordan'], 'Starring': ['Henry Fonda', 'Robert Shaw', 'Robert Ryan']} Review Text: I would have given the movie a four for historical accuracy had there not been so many American made tanks impersonating German tanks. Review Title: American made tanks against American made tanks Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/01/10 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Vicky Matthews'], 'Producers': ['Jeremy Dear', 'Robert Strange', 'Vicky Matthews'], 'Starring': ['Samuel West'], 'Studio': ['PBS']} Review Text: Or from royalty for that matter. Much of my linage dates back to the Vikings and the Irish.
Therefore, the program was too snooty for my taste. I was waiting for Eric the Red to bust down the door and cleave everyone into little pieces but it wasn't going to happen so I changed the channel. Review Title: I'm not an aristocrat Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/01/10 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Roman Polanski'], 'Producers': ['Wolfgang Glattes', 'Roman Polanski'], 'Starring': ['Johnny Depp', 'Frank Langella', 'Lena Olin'], 'Studio': ['LIONSGATE']} Review Text: And Jonny Dep does a very good job with this character but I was a little disappointed with the end of the movie. Review Title: Good dirrecting Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/01/28 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tommy Wirkola'], 'Producers': ['Will Ferrell', 'Adam McKay', 'Kevin Messick', 'Beau Flynn'], 'Starring': ['Jeremy Renner', 'Gemma Arterton', 'Famke Janssen'], 'Studio': ['Paramount Pictures']} Review Text: The movie has great special effects and lot's of satire n a spoofish kind of way. It's very action packed from beginning to end with all kinds of neat, truly unbelievable weapons for the supposed time period. Great actors and Lots of fun! Review Title: Witches get baked Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/02/01 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English'], 'Directors': ['Kurt Wimmer'], 'Producers': ['Jan De Bont', 'Lucas Foster'], 'Starring': ['Christian Bale', 'Taye Diggs', 'Emily Watson'], 'Studio': ['MIRAMAX']} Review Text: Christian Bales' best performance ever! The movie has a great plot and storyline, with amazing visual effects for an older movie.
I was completely enthralled by this movie. I've watched it twice and could see it again. Review Title: An excellent movie Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/02/01 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ridley Scott'], 'Producers': ['Dino De Laurentiis', 'Martha De Laurentiis', 'Ridley Scott', 'Terry Needham'], 'Starring': ['Anthony Hopkins', 'Julianne Moore', 'Gary Oldman'], 'Studio': ['MGM']} Review Text: Hannibal Lecture is back to being his extremely ruthless yet elegantly psychopathic self. In this bone chilling film, you know Hannibal is going to win because of his genius level intelligence. I found myself yelling at the screen, "don't do it man, your going to die"! Review Title: Great movie Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/02/01 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Simon West'], 'Producers': ['Danny Lerner', 'Les Weldon', 'Avi Lerner', 'Kevin King-Templeton'], 'Starring': ['Sylvester Stallone', 'Jason Statham', 'Jet Li'], 'Studio': ['Lions Gate Films Inc.']} Review Text: If you like a lot of action and don't mind a lack of pure drama, then this is your movie. Stallone even do's a good job of not sounding retarded. There's lots of cool weapons with firepower, things constantly getting blown to smithereens, and a large cast of mostly great actors. Review Title: Another great movie Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/02/11 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Peter Yates'], 'Producers': ["Philip D'Antoni"], 'Starring': ['Steve McQueen', 'Robert Vaughn', 'Jacqueline Bisset'], 'Studio': ['WARNER BROS.']} Review Text: Steve McQueen's best movie in my opinion. I've seen it several times and it never get's old. The car chase scene with two muscle cars, 96 Mustang fast back, Steve's car, and a Dodge Charger, the bad guys, is simply too cool! The movie also has a very good plot and story line and there is much detective work involved although in todays world, no CIS would touch any evidence without surgical gloves on. All in all, still a great movie in todays world. Review Title: A great movie Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/03/10 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Christopher McQuarrie'], 'Producers': ['Tom Cruise', 'Don Granger', 'Paula Wagner', 'Gary Levinsohn', 'Jack Myers', 'Ken Kamins', 'Kevin Messick', 'David Ellison'], 'Starring': ['Tom Cruise', 'Rosamund Pike', 'Richard Jenkins'], 'Studio': ['Hit Movies']} Review Text: It was a good movie and true to his persona as the baldest dude on the block,
Tom Cruise is entertaining in this movie. Nothing profound but lot's of action and
the motion in the film makes it worth watching. Review Title: It was a good movie Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/04/22 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jon M. Chu'], 'Producers': ['Lorenzo Di Bonaventura', 'Brian Goldner'], 'Starring': ['D.J. Cotrona', 'Byung-Hun Lee', 'Adrianne Palicki']} Review Text: I definitely liked it! There was very much action all the way through and that mountain scene was incredible. Nothing here to blubber in your morning coffee about, just a solid dude movie with some well built chicks in it. Review Title: A guy movie Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has consistently enjoyed action-packed films with engaging plots and strong performances. They appreciated the humor and satire in various movies, highlighting elements like special effects and thrilling sequences. Throughout the reviews, they expressed excitement over character portrayals, particularly noting impressive performances from notable actors. The user's appreciation for classic films is evident in their repeated enjoyment of certain titles, mentioning excellent storylines that capture attention and are worth rewatching. Overall, they favor films that offer entertainment, excitement, and a sense of thrill.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite several positive experiences, the user encountered disappointments primarily regarding the authenticity and pacing of certain films. They found particular content overly pretentious or not to their taste, feeling that some stories did not resonate with them. Several reviews indicate dissatisfaction with plot conclusions or elements that did not meet expectations. Additionally, there were instances where the user critiqued the portrayal of historical accuracy, suggesting a preference for more realistic interpretations in narratives.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's purchase history reflects a diverse film interest, leaning heavily towards action and engaging storytelling. They generally favor films that provide thrilling entertainment, showcasing notable performances and captivating effects. However, there are notable points of discontent centered around authenticity and perceived shortcomings in storylines. Overall, their feedback indicates a balance of enthusiasm for enjoyable cinema while maintaining critical perspectives on specific aspects that detract from their viewing experience.

target_interaction.title: Great episodes!
target_interaction.text: Once I started watching I couldn't stop until I'd watched every episode. Each episode is like a mini movie and all the actors are great and the directing and production is first class.
